color.description: The color line determines both how the region displays in the colonial regions map mode, as well as the right half of flags for colonial nations spawned in this region.

tax_income.description: Random new world generation: Base tax

native_size.description: Random new world generation: Number of natives (each point representing 100 natives)

native_ferocity.description: Random new world generation: native ferocity

native_hostileness.description: Random new world generation: native hostileness

trade_goods.description: Random new world generation: Proportional chance of each trade good appearing.

religion.description: Random new world generation: Proportional chance of having religion X during generation.

culture.description: Random new world generation: Proportional chance of having culture X during generation.

provinces.description: Provinces belonging to a region. A province may only belong to one region.

names.description: What name a colonial nation in this region will have. The first name matched will be taken.

trigger.description: Optional. Scope is the colonial nation overlord.

name.description: Localization string for nation. May be a province name if specified as PROV[1234].
